subject: Re: So many "Hack" configurations, so little time
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Judy,

There is no part number listed on the mixer; only the name (PRO-MIX 
Audio/Video Mixer).  The speakers are Labtec CS-180, but Labtec has 
many other part numbers you can get too.

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "judy_in_hollywood" 
<Ticket_to_Heaven@...> wrote:

Springs.

have

grocery

used
